Tutorials.Name: Intro to coding
Tutorials.Description: Welcome to the wonderful world of coding! In this first lesson you'll learn how to give instructions to your obedient computer.

Tutorials.Name: Pixels and Coordinates
Tutorials.Description: Learn about Pixels, Resolution and Coordinates - important computer science concepts wildly used in CodeGuppy.

Tutorials.Name: Expressions and Variables
Tutorials.Description: Expressions and variables are the core of any programming language. Learn about these concepts using a fun lesson.

Tutorials.Name: Functions
Tutorials.Description: Create new 'instructions' and achieve code modularization through the use of functions.

Tutorials.Name: Variables and Functions recap
Tutorials.Description: In this lesson you'll recap variables, expressions and functions and learn about the concept of strings.

Tutorials.Name: Artist
Tutorials.Description: Draw colored lines, circles and other shapes with the awesome Artist program.

Tutorials.Name: Blocky
Tutorials.Description: Pixel art is awesome. This tutorial will show you how easy is to build a simple pixel art editor.

Tutorials.Name: Color Blocky
Tutorials.Description: Pixel art is awesome. With this tutorial you'll learn how to build your own pixel art editor.

Tutorials.Name: Breakout
Tutorials.Description: Breakout game is a classic. Learn how to recreate this game that will offer you hours of entertainment.

Tutorials.Name: Analog clock
Tutorials.Description: With all the digital gadgets around us, analog clocks represents a classical beauty. Learn how to re-create one with our tutorial and a little bit of trigonometry.

Tutorials.Name: Micro draw
Tutorials.Description: It is amazing that in a few lines of code you can create a draw program.

Tutorials.Name: Falling balloons
Tutorials.Description: Balloons are falling! Pop them all with your needle to win the game.

Tutorials.Name: Plot a function
Tutorials.Description: A simple and efficient function plotter.

Tutorials.Name: Visual sort
Tutorials.Description: Visualize what happens in computer memory during a common sort operation.

Tutorials.Name: Invaders
Tutorials.Description: Invaders game is one of the most well known classic games. Learn how to how to create your own custom clone of this game.

Tutorials.Name: Input text
Tutorials.Description: Build an arcade style name input screen.

Tutorials.Name: Line artist
Tutorials.Description: Create amazing drawings and texts using colored line art.

Tutorials.Name: Micro spirograph
Tutorials.Description: Tune our micro spirograph and enjoy the amazing shapes left behind.

Tutorials.Name: Magnetic needles
Tutorials.Description: Have fun moving your mouse in a field of magnetic needles.

Tutorials.Name: Eyes mouse
Tutorials.Description: Learn how to build the famous eyes that follow the mouse cursor.

Tutorials.Name: Movable
Tutorials.Description: Have fun with our drawing while learn how to implement movable shapes.

Tutorials.Name: Musical Notes
Tutorials.Description: Play with the musical notes to create your symphony.

Tutorials.Name: Plane vs Objects
Tutorials.Description: Pilot the airplane and distroy all the objects before your crash into them.

Tutorials.Name: Planets
Tutorials.Description: Learn how to create a simulation of our solar system with realistic planet movement.

Tutorials.Name: Pop balloons
Tutorials.Description: Use your keyboard typing skills to shoot all the balloons.

Tutorials.Name: Random shapes
Tutorials.Description: A visually interesting demo using only random shapes.

Tutorials.Name: Computer poetry
Tutorials.Description: With a little bit of coding, your computer can be a poet. Have fun at the amazing writtings.

Tutorials.Name: Sliding puzzle
Tutorials.Description: Implement the classic sliding puzzle... and then have fun solving it. Perhaps you can even share it with your friends.

Tutorials.Name: Snake
Tutorials.Description: Guide the snake around the obstacles to find the exit door.

Tutorials.Name: Sprite MouseMove
Tutorials.Description: A small sprite animation on mouse move.

Tutorials.Name: Retro sprite
Tutorials.Description: Create a retro sprite using only an array of numbers.

Tutorials.Name: Falling spiders
Tutorials.Description: Use the binary system to efficientize the retro sprite storage... and then animate the sprite to implement falling spiders effect.

Tutorials.Name: Tic Tac Toe
Tutorials.Description: Implement the classical game of Tic Tac Toe and play a match against computer.

Tutorials.Name: Pong
Tutorials.Description: Play a game of Pong against the computer. It can be pretty challenging.

Tutorials.Name: Random circle
Tutorials.Description: Watch how a series of dots are moving to reconstruct a circle.

Tutorials.Name: Jagged shapes
Tutorials.Description: When straight lines and circles are not enought, you can implement jagged shapes.

Tutorials.Name: Virtual screen
Tutorials.Description: Implement the game mechanism for virtual world scrolling games.

Tutorials.Name: Connect the dots
Tutorials.Description: Learnd how to implement 'Connect the dots' game that you can share it with your friends and family.

Tutorials.Name: Character editor
Tutorials.Description: Implement an 8x8 character editor that you can use to edit your own fonts or sprites.

Tutorials.Name: User defined characters
Tutorials.Description: Learn how to define and write with 8x8 characters while exercising binary to hex transformation in the process.

Tutorials.Name: Bitmap font
Tutorials.Description: Take the writing with 8x8 bitmap fonts to a new level.

Tutorials.Name: LED scrolling
Tutorials.Description: Implement a classical scrolling LED display to transmit your messages in style.

Tutorials.Name: LED matrix
Tutorials.Description: Learn how to implement a color LED matrix for displaying your messages.

Tutorials.Name: Turtle graphics
Tutorials.Description: Turtle graphics is the flagship feature of Logo programming language. See how easy is to add Logo like commands to your favorite JavaScript language.

Tutorials.Name: Guessing game
Tutorials.Description: Pick an object from the display list then let the computer find the answer by answering a series of questions.

Tutorials.Name: Lava lamp
Tutorials.Description: Create nice animations that simulate a red and white lavalamp.

Tutorials.Name: Color lava lamp
Tutorials.Description: Simulate a color lavalamp using metaballs.

Tutorials.Name: Seven segment display
Tutorials.Description: Learn what it takes to create a classic seven segment display to display the current time in style.

Tutorials.Name: Word search
Tutorials.Description: Send your friends a special greeting... To see they first have to solve a classic game of word search.
